meanings.sent1: The contract was legally binding, ensuring both parties followed the agreed terms.
meanings.sent2: She obtained a legally valid license to operate her business in the city.
meanings.sent3: The dog proudly wore his legally required collar, feeling like a fashion icon.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood tall and legally planted in the middle of the park, providing shade for picnickers.
meanings.sent5: The building was legally constructed, meeting all safety regulations and standards.
